column2: Trigger an event for each vassal which then triggers an event from them to us in which we can decide to free them or not.
column6: Activar un evento para cada vasallo que luego desencadena un evento de ellos hacia nosotros en el que podemos decidir si liberarlos o no.

column2: Trigger an event for each vassal which then triggers an event from them to us in which we can decide to free them or not.
column6: Activar un evento para cada vasallo que luego desencadena un evento de ellos hacia nosotros en el que podemos decidir si liberarlos o no.

column2: Make each vassal send an event to us that lets use choose to free them or not.
column6: Haz que cada vasallo nos envíe un evento que nos permita elegir si lo liberamos o no.

column2: Our overlord is considering granting us our freedom.
column6: Nuestro señor está considerando concedernos la libertad.
